item.title: A_Brief_Guide_To_DuckDuckGo
item.description: Or why you should be using it even if you don’t care about privacy or don’t know what a search engine bubble may be. It’s in no way comprehensive nor “the best of”. Just what I find more useful. Time days between today and 02/28/2013 = 16 days. Unfortunately, this uses the US month/day/year format 18:30 to 19:25 = 55 minutes february calendar = print the calendar for this year’s february Travel weather = weather for your current location 80100 = search for the map of your postal code.
